body_html:
I am using Bazel 0.4.0, python 2.7 and Mac 10.11.6. I have the same issue with running bazel build -c opt --local_resources 2048,.5,1.0 //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

ERROR: no such package 'tensorflow/tools/pip_package': BUILD file not found on package path.
body_text:
I am using Bazel 0.4.0, python 2.7 and Mac 10.11.6. I have the same issue with running bazel build -c opt  --local_resources 2048,.5,1.0 //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package

ERROR: no such package 'tensorflow/tools/pip_package': BUILD file not found on package path.
body:
I am using Bazel 0.4.0, python 2.7 and Mac 10.11.6. I have the same issue with running `bazel build -c opt  --local_resources 2048,.5,1.0 //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package`

> ERROR: no such package 'tensorflow/tools/pip_package': BUILD file not found on package path.
